name: legacybridge-cc-plugins
description: Collection of Claude Code plugins and tools by Frank Wang

plugins.name: teds
plugins.description: Task Execution Documentation System - Comprehensive documentation for complex, multi-session tasks

plugins.name: akashicrecords
plugins.description: Generic knowledge management with RULE.md-driven business logic - universal file operations that adapt to any directory structure

plugins.name: projectmaster
plugins.description: Comprehensive software project management system with support for Agile, Scrum, Kanban, and Waterfall methodologies. Manages meetings, sprints, milestones, and project documentation with full AkashicRecords governance integration.

plugins.name: multi-perspective
plugins.description: Multi-perspective analysis tool that dynamically generates expert roles to analyze propositions from multiple angles. Supports validation, comprehensive analysis, and debate modes with optional AkashicRecords integration.

plugins.name: tailwindplus
plugins.description: Access TailwindPlus UI component library - search, list, and retrieve code for Marketing, Application UI, and eCommerce components in HTML/React/Vue with Tailwind CSS v3/v4

plugins.name: agent-browser
plugins.description: Automates browser interactions for web testing, form filling, screenshots, and data extraction

plugins.name: gemini-api
plugins.description: Google Gemini API integration for text generation, multimodal analysis, image generation (Nano Banana), function calling, search grounding, and embeddings via REST API

plugins.name: steady-hand
plugins.description: Maintains quality standards by injecting reminders when context usage exceeds threshold

plugins.name: engram
plugins.description: Persistent memory system with three-file separation and preset templates for personal assistant, project assistant, character companion, and pair programmer use cases

plugins.name: meta-skill
plugins.description: Dynamic skill library that loads skills on-demand from SKILLUSE.md instead of at session startup. Supports auto-matching user intent to skills and dynamic skill management.
